missionDescription: Add a toy dataset CSV aligned to the extraction template; implement a one-command run that outputs (1) pooled estimate table (CSV/JSON) and (2) one plot (PNG/PDF) into a deterministic folder (e.g., runtime/_build/) with a run log.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
